00047 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 void TM_InitPWMData(void);
00049 
00050 void PDMA_Configuration(void);
00051 void TM_Configuration(void);
00052 
00053 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 u32 CCR_Buffer[3];
00055 
00056 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00058   * @brief  Main program.
00059   * @retval None
00060   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00061 int main(void)
00062 {
00063   TM_InitPWMData();
00064 
00065   PDMA_Configuration();
00066 
00067   TM_Configuration();
00068 
00069   while (1)
00070   {
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00075   * @brief  Init data PWM data for compare match register.
00076   * @retval None
00077   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00078 void TM_InitPWMData(void)
00079 {
00080   u32 uCounterReload;
00081 
00082   uCounterReload = SystemCoreClock / 2000;   // PWM frequency = 2 kHz
00083   CCR_Buffer[0] = uCounterReload * 1 / 4;    // 25 %
00084   CCR_Buffer[1] = uCounterReload * 1 / 2;    // 50 %
00085   CCR_Buffer[2] = uCounterReload * 3 / 4;    // 75 %
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00089   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00090   * @retval None
00091   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00092 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00093 {
00094   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00095     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00096     CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA = 1;
00097     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00098   }
00099 
00100   {
00101     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00102        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00103        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00104     */
00105     PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00106 
00107     /* PDMA configuration                                                                                   */
00108     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)CCR_Buffer;
00109     #if (_HTCFG_PWM_CHN == 0)
00110     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&(HTCFG_PWM_PORT->CH0CCR);
00111     #endif
00112     #if (_HTCFG_PWM_CHN == 1)
00113     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&(HTCFG_PWM_PORT->CH1CCR);
00114     #endif
00115     #if (_HTCFG_PWM_CHN == 2)
00116     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&(HTCFG_PWM_PORT->CH2CCR);
00117     #endif
00118     #if (_HTCFG_PWM_CHN == 3)
00119     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)&(HTCFG_PWM_PORT->CH3CCR);
00120     #endif
00121     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = 3;
00122     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00123     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_32BIT;
00124     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = VH_PRIO;
00125     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX | AUTO_RELOAD;
00126     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_PDMA_CH, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00127   }
00128 
00129   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_PDMA_CH, ENABLE);
00130 }
00131 
00132 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00133   * @brief  Timer configuration.
00134   * @retval None
00135   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00136 void TM_Configuration(void)
00137 {
00138   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00139     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00140     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00141     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_PWM_IPN = 1;
00142     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00143   }
00144 
00145   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00146   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM0_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM0_AFIO_FUN);
00147 
00148   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00149 
00150     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00151        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00152        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00153     */
00154     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00155 
00156     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = 1 - 1;                               // Timer clock = CK_AHB / 1
00157     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = (SystemCoreClock / 2000) - 1;    // PWM frequency = 2 kHz
00158     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00159     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00160     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00161     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00162 
00163     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00164     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00165   }
00166 
00167   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00168 
00169     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00170        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00171        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00172     */
00173     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00174 
00175     OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_PWM0_CH;
00176     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM1;
00177     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00178     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00179     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00180     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00181     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00182     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00183     OutInit.Compare = 0x0;                                    // PWM duty = 0 %
00184     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00185     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, &OutInit);
00186   }
00187 
00188   #if (IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_PWM_IPN))
00189   /* MCTM channel Main Output Enable                                                                        */
00190   MCTM_CHMOECmd(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, ENABLE);
00191   #endif
00192 
00193   /* MCTM/GPTM Update Event PDMA request enable                                                             */
00194   TM_PDMAConfig(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, TM_PDMA_UEV, ENABLE);
00195 
00196   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, ENABLE);
00197 }
00198 
00199 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00200 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00201   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00202   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00203   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00204   * @retval None
00205   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00206 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00207 {
00208   /*
00209      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00210      Debug message can be added here.
00211      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00212   */
00213 
00214   while (1)
00215   {
00216   }
00217 }
00218 #endif
